cells.data: -- dropFileName :: FilePath -> FilePathon dropFileName(strPath)	if strPath ≠ "" then		if character -1 of strPath = "/" then			strPath		else			set xs to init(splitOn("/", strPath))			if xs ≠ {} then				intercalate("/", xs) & "/"			else				"./"			end if		end if	else		"./"	end ifend dropFileName
